docs.title: Asking if we should?
docs.text:
I was asked by the Columbia Climate School to host a "Hot Topics" seminar, to debate if an assumption that was the center of my activity was true. I've always been working to massively scale insurance, but haddnt really questioned if we should.

On Feb 6 Columbia Climate School Hot Topics Seminar, we debated if we should scale index insurace to the global majority-and if we could do it responsibly.

Feel welcome to click through the updated presentation. Please do check out the links inside of the presentation, I think they are cool.

If you click on next (or What People Said in the sidebar), you can see the answers people have filled out up to the timestamp of the figure starting with the answers the students entered in class.
